meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Marjika Howarth Will Gilbert Laurie MacDougall Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #7329.

td.p: Marjika Howarth, a mother of 4 from South Jordan, Utah
Will Gilbert, a retail manager from St. Louis, Missouri
Laurie MacDougall, a cancer registrar originally from Medford, Massachusetts (whose 2-day cash winnings total $51,700)

tr.td: FIRST FAMILY PETS
LITERARY NICKNAMES
ADELE
GET TOGETHER
FOR DRINKS
& APPS

tr.td: Laurie
Will
Marjika
THRILLED TO THE MARROW
FRENCH ARTS & CULTURE
PRODUCE THE CELEBRITY NAME
[Pronounced "PROD-uce"] (Alex: And I did not mispronounce that.)
THE LIBRARY OF CONGRESS
COUNTRIES OF THE WORLD
WORD OF THE "DAY"

(Marjika: Great.)

(Eve) Plumb

LaurieMarjika
')
